text: Phir unn ki ehad shikni ki waja say hum ney unn per apni laanat nazil farma di aur unn kay dil sakht ker diye kay woh kalaam ko uss ki jagah say badal daaltay hain aur jo kuch naseehat unhen ki gaee thi uss ka boht bara hissa bhula bethay unn ki aik na aik khayanat per tujhay itlaa milti hi rahey gi haan thoray say aisay nahi bhi hain pus tu unhen moaf kerta jaa aur dar guzar kerta reh be-shak Allah Taalaa ehsan kerney walon say mohabbat kerta hai
